Interface Dao<T>

Type Parameters:
T - The entity type this DAO manages.
All Known Implementing Classes:
BookDaoImpl, BorrowingDaoImpl, CopyDaoImpl, LibrarianDaoImpl, PublisherDaoImpl, UserDaoImpl
public interface Dao<T>
A generic DAO (Data Access Object) interface providing basic CRUD operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    create(T entity)
    Persists a new entity in the database.
    void
    delete(Long id)
    Deletes an entity by its ID.
    List<T>
    findAll()
    Retrieves all entities of type T.
    T
    findById(Long id)
    Finds an entity by its unique ID.
    T
    update(T entity)
    Updates an existing entity in the database.

  • Method Details

    • create

      T create(T entity)
      Persists a new entity in the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity to create.
      Returns:
      The persisted entity with any generated fields (e.g., ID).

    • findById

      T findById(Long id)
      Finds an entity by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to find.
      Returns:
      The found entity, or null if not present.

    • findAll

      List<T> findAll()
      Retrieves all entities of type T.
      Returns:
      A list of all entities of type T.

    • update

      T update(T entity)
      Updates an existing entity in the database.
      Parameters:
      entity - The entity with updated fields.
      Returns:
      The merged (updated) entity.

    • delete

      void delete(Long id)
      Deletes an entity by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the entity to delete.
